mapper.select: SELECT NEW.BOOKNO, NEW.TITLE, NEW.WRITER, NEW.PUBLISHER, NEW.SALESPRICE, NEW.CHANGEFILENAME FROM (SELECT B.*, BI.CHANGEFILENAME FROM BOOK B, BOOKIMAGES BI WHERE B.BOOKNO = BI.BOOKNO AND BI.FILELEVEL= 0 AND B.STATUS = 'ONSALE' AND B.CREDATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1, -1) AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) ORDER BY B.PUBLISHEDDATE DESC, B.BOOKNO DESC ) NEW WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOOKNO, B.TITLE, B.WRITER, B.PUBLISHER, B.SALESPRICE, BI.CHANGEFILENAME FROM PAYDETAIL P INNER JOIN BOOK B ON P.BOOKNO = B.BOOKNO INNER JOIN BOOKIMAGES BI ON B.BOOKNO = BI.BOOKNO WHERE BI.FILELEVEL= 0 AND B.STATUS = 'ONSALE' GROUP BY B.BOOKNO, B.TITLE, B.WRITER, B.PUBLISHER, B.SALESPRICE, BI.CHANGEFILENAME ORDER BY SUM(P.QUANTITY) DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 9

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.BOOKNO, B.TITLE, B.WRITER, B.PUBLISHER, B.SALESPRICE, BI.CHANGEFILENAME FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN BOOK B ON R.BOOKNO = B.BOOKNO INNER JOIN BOOKIMAGES BI ON B.BOOKNO = BI.BOOKNO WHERE BI.FILELEVEL= 0 AND B.STATUS = 'ONSALE' GROUP BY B.BOOKNO, B.TITLE, B.WRITER, B.PUBLISHER, B.SALESPRICE, BI.CHANGEFILENAME ORDER BY COUNT(R.CONTENT) DESC, NVL(ROUND(AVG(R.RATING), 1), 0) DESC, B.BOOKNO DESC ) WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT B.*, BI.CHANGEFILENAME FROM BOOK B, BOOKIMAGES BI WHERE B.BOOKNO = BI.BOOKNO AND BI.FILELEVEL= 0 AND TYPE = #{type} ORDER BY B.CREDATE DESC, B.BOOKNO DESC) A
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE TYPE = #{type}
SELECT B.*, BI.CHANGEFILENAME FROM BOOK B, BOOKIMAGES BI WHERE B.BOOKNO = BI.BOOKNO AND BI.FILELEVEL= 0 AND B.BOOKNO = #{bookNo} ORDER BY B.CREDATE DESC, B.BOOKNO DESC
